patthana8.25:1.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ nasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto nasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saññojanavippayuttaṃ nasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saññojanavippayuttaṃ nasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto nasaññojaniyo ca saññojanavippayutto naasaññojaniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana8.25:2.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ naasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana8.25:3.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ nasaññojaniyañca saññojanavippayuttaṃ naasaññojaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.25:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
